name: Farscape Development
overview:
Farscape Development offer innovative ways to improve your business through the development and improvement of soft skills, for example leadership or communication skills.

Through experiential training programmes which aim to increase profit through people development, Farscape produce measurable results which have long-lasting effects. Courses vary from one day inspirational leadership workshops, to two week Overseas Learning Experiences in locations such as Costa Rica, India and The Arctic. All courses are shaped with consideration of your business needs and tailored to achieve the results your business requires. To find out more visit www.farscapedevelopment.co.uk

milestones.description: Farscape have pioneered teh overseas learning experience, which is a rigorous combination of international travel in exciting environments and experiential behavcioural training.
